name: my-playwright-project
description: End-to-end tests using Playwright with TypeScript

scripts.trace:last: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$z = Get-ChildItem 'artifacts\traces' -Recurse -Filter trace.zip | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1; if(-not $z){ Write-Error 'No traces found under artifacts\traces'; exit 1 }; npx playwright show-trace $($z.FullName)"
scripts.codegen:edge: start-server-and-test "npm run dev:server" http://localhost:4000 "npx playwright codegen --channel=msedge http://localhost:4000"
scripts.codegen:chrome: start-server-and-test "npm run dev:server" http://localhost:4000 "npx playwright codegen --channel=chrome  http://localhost:4000"
scripts.commit:patch: npm version patch &&git add -A && git commit -m "%npm_config_m%" && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.commit:minor: npm version minor && git add -A && git commit -m "%npm_config_m%" && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.commit:major: npm version major && git add -A && git commit -m "%npm_config_m%" && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.help: node -e "const p=require('./package.json');const d=p.scriptDescriptions||{};const s=p.scripts;const keys=Object.keys(s);const pad=keys.reduce((m,k)=>Math.max(m,k.length),0);for(const k of keys){const desc=d[k]?` - ${d[k]}`:'';console.log((k+':').padEnd(pad+2)+s[k]+desc);}"

scriptDescriptions.dev:server: Start the Express demo server on port 4000 via tsx.
scriptDescriptions.test: Run the full Playwright test suite for all projects.
scriptDescriptions.test:headless: Run all tests headless (uses HEADLESS=1 to override config).
scriptDescriptions.test:headed: Run all tests headed (CLI flag overrides config).
scriptDescriptions.test:edge: Run only the Microsoft Edge project.
scriptDescriptions.test:chrome: Run only the Google Chrome project.
scriptDescriptions.debug: Run tests with the Playwright Inspector (PWDEBUG=1).
scriptDescriptions.debug:last: Inspector for only the last failed tests.
scriptDescriptions.report: Open the HTML report from artifacts/report/playwright-report.
scriptDescriptions.trace:last: Open the most recent trace.zip from artifacts/traces.
scriptDescriptions.codegen:edge: Spin up the server and launch Playwright Codegen in Edge.
scriptDescriptions.codegen:chrome: Spin up the server and launch Codegen in Chrome.
scriptDescriptions.snaps:update: Update the Chrome-only screenshot baselines for screenshots-ui.spec.ts.
scriptDescriptions.snaps:verify: Verify current UI against Chrome screenshot baselines.
scriptDescriptions.commit:patch: bump patch version, Stage, commit (pass message with --m="…"),
scriptDescriptions.commit:minor: bump minor version, Stage, commit (pass message with --m="…"),
scriptDescriptions.commit:major: bump major version, Stage, commit (pass message with --m="…"),
scriptDescriptions.preversion: Hook: run tests before version bump.
scriptDescriptions.postversion: Hook: push commits and tags to origin main.

author: Brittany Bales
